content.rendered:
Directed by Laxman Utekar.

Written by Rohan Shankar.

Cast Kartik Aaryan(Vinod ‘Guddu’ Shukla). Kriti Sanon(Rashmi Trivedi). Aparshakti Khurana(Abbas Shaikh). Pankaj Tripathi(Babulal). Vinay Pathak(Vishnu Trivedi Ji). Atul Srivastava(Badriprasad Shukla). Alka Amin(Shakuntala Shukla). Vishwanath Chatterjee(Varun Shukla). Samarth Chauhan(Chikoo Shukla). Neha Saraf(Janki Shukla). Arun Kushwah(Chotu (Babulal’s Sidekick)). Sapna Sand(Mrs. Srivastava (Neighbour)). Ajeet Singh(Shrikant Trivedi). Vimi Mehta(Savitri Trivedi) . Backagaindancer(Adita Naath). Shreya Bhattacharya(Myra). Kumkum Jain(Chandni). Mohammad Salman Khan(Salman). Ferdous Nir(Taj). Vikash Rajput(Vikash Rajput). Harsh Shashwat(Digital Partner). Abhinav Shukla(Nazeem Khan). Kuldeep Gurgaon Singh(Pandit ji (as Kuldeep Singh)). Nabil Singh(Pandit). Vijay Srivastava(Property dealer)

Language Hindi.

Producers Vishal Bajaj. Smriti Jain. Hetvi Karia. Sharada Karki. Kushagra Kulshrestha. Ashok Shetty. Dinesh Vijan. Pooja Vijan.

Production MacGuffin Pictures. RSV. RSVPMovies.
